data: On the eastern coast of the mountain which rises above Port Louis in the Mauritius, upon a piece of land bearing the marks of former cultivation, are seen the ruins of two small cottages.
eastern coast of the mountain above Port Louis | piece of land bearing marks of former cultivation
Paul and Virginia from the French of J.B.H. de Saint Pierre
Saint-Pierre, Bernardin de, 1737-1814; Williams, Helen Maria, 1762-1827 [Translator]
